title: Submissive Desires
description: This is an extremely explicit and very severe story, containing intense spanking and caning, breast, anal, and genital punishment, as well as bondage.Submissive Desires relates the tale of Simon and Maura, and the awakening of a fully-realized D/S relationship. Simon is an ex-Navy Seal and he knows what he wants when he finally finds it, and Maura is it. The problem is that Maura "thinks" she's submissive, but all she's ever done is play with it.Simon is the real thing. Moving back and forth between their first encounters five years earlier and the present day, Submissive Desires recounts Maura's awakening at the hands of the VERY dominant Simon. She struggles intensely between her love for Simon and trepidation over the path down which he is leading her.
author: Carolyn Faulkner
